hypothesis_content.title: Intraday V-Shaped Reversal Momentum Fade
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC drops >3% within 2 hours during a NEUTRAL/BEAR regime, then recovers >50% of the drop within the next 2 hours without fundamental news, the recovery momentum will fade, and price will retest the lows within 6 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Sharp recoveries without fundamental drivers in weak regimes are often short covering or low-conviction bounces. Lack of positive funding rates suggests no strong long repositioning. Momentum tends to fade, leading to retest.
entry_conditions: Price then recovers >50% of the drop within next 2 hours
No major scheduled news (Fed, CPI, exchange issues) in the window
Funding rates remain neutral or negative during recovery
Entry on 1H close below VWAP of the recovery candle

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price retraces to within 0.5% of the initial drop low
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price exceeds the high of the recovery candle

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If >60% of such V-shaped recoveries continue to rally beyond the recovery high, indicating sustained buying pressure instead of fade.
